content.p: The Award is the University's free employability scheme that helps you prepare for the job market and formally recognises your extracurricular activities. There are options for all students, with the Nottingham Postgraduate Advantage Award available for postgraduate students. You can get involved regardless of what you are studying or where you are based. It is a great way to add value to your CV. More information Student enquire centre Learn more about the Award by visiting our webpage. 1. Search the module catalogue Find a module that interests you; search by category or by when it takes place 2. Check when it's available 3. Find out what it involves 4. Decide if it's for you
